episode.title: Schlesinger v. Reservists Committee to Stop the War

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I also have to announce number 72-1188, Schlesinger against the Reservists Committee to stop the War.

This case also involves the question of standing to bring suit in the Federal Courts, and for reasons stated in the opinion filed today, the judgment of the Court of Appeals under review is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the Court's opinion.
Mr. Justice Stewart filed a concurring opinion; Justices Douglas, Brennan and Marshall have filed or joined in the dissenting opinions of others.
